segment.source: Viewing the Events Screen in Compatibility Administrator (Windows 10)
segment.target: Viewing the Events Screen in Compatibility Administrator (Windows 10)

segment.source: The Events screen enables you to record and to view your activities in the Compatibility Administrator tool, provided that the screen is open while you perform the activities.
segment.target: The Events screen enables you to record and to view your activities in the Compatibility Administrator tool, provided that the screen is open while you perform the activities.

segment.source: Viewing the Events Screen in Compatibility Administrator
segment.target: Viewing the Events Screen in Compatibility Administrator

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 8.1
segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.source: Windows 8
segment.target: Windows 8

segment.source: Windows 7
segment.target: Windows 7

segment.source: Windows Server 2012
segment.target: Windows Server 2012

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2

segment.source: The Events screen enables you to record and to view your activities in the Compatibility Administrator tool, provided that the screen is open while you perform the activities.
segment.target: The Events screen enables you to record and to view your activities in the Compatibility Administrator tool, provided that the screen is open while you perform the activities.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The Events screen only records your activities when the screen is open.
segment.target: The Events screen only records your activities when the screen is open.

segment.source: If you perform an action before opening the Events screen, the action will not appear in the list.
segment.target: If you perform an action before opening the Events screen, the action will not appear in the list.

segment.source: To open the Events screen
segment.target: To open the Events screen

segment.source: On the View menu, click Events.
segment.target: On the View menu, click Events.

segment.source: Handling Multiple Copies of Compatibility Fixes
segment.target: Handling Multiple Copies of Compatibility Fixes

segment.source: Compatibility Administrator enables you to copy your compatibility fixes from one database to another, which can become confusing after adding multiple fixes, compatibility modes, and databases.
segment.target: Compatibility Administrator enables you to copy your compatibility fixes from one database to another, which can become confusing after adding multiple fixes, compatibility modes, and databases.

segment.source: For example, you can copy a fix called MyFix from Database 1 to Database 2.
segment.target: For example, you can copy a fix called MyFix from Database 1 to Database 2.

segment.source: However, if there is already a fix called MyFix in Database 2, Compatibility Administrator renames the fix as MyFix (1) to avoid duplicate names.
segment.target: However, if there is already a fix called MyFix in Database 2, Compatibility Administrator renames the fix as MyFix (1) to avoid duplicate names.

segment.source: If you open the Events screen and then perform the copy operation, you can see a description of the action, along with the time stamp, which enables you to view your fix information without confusion.
segment.target: If you open the Events screen and then perform the copy operation, you can see a description of the action, along with the time stamp, which enables you to view your fix information without confusion.
